title: Bitcoin Briefly Drops Below $67,000 as Stock Divergence Rises
description: Bitcoin’s correlation with stocks continued to diverge, with the original cryptocurrency declining while US equities were mostly flat after a stronger-than-anticipated US jobs report, suggesting investor confidence has yet to recover from this year’s crash in digital asset prices.
content: Bitcoin’s correlation with stocks continued to diverge, with the original cryptocurrency declining while US equities were mostly flat after a stronger-than-anticipated US jobs report, suggesting investor confidence has yet to recover from this year’s crash in digital asset prices.
